item.title: 【Conference Paper】Research on the theme evolution of gender and economic public opinion in time series.
item.description: The manuscript has been accepted for the 30th AMIC conference. I will be attending and presenting on September 24-26. The link will be provided once the conference proceedings and abstracts are published. The official website of the conference View the paper (CN)
